LanguageData.FRMT_CheeseMozzarella.label: Mozzarella Cheese
LanguageData.FRMT_CheeseMozzarella.description: A shredded, low moisture mozzarella. Fresh mozzarella is generally white but may vary seasonally to slightly yellow depending on the animal's diet.
LanguageData.FRMT_CheeseCottage.label: Cottage Cheese
LanguageData.FRMT_CheeseCottage.description: Cottage cheese is a fresh cheese curd product with a mild flavor. In the past, it was known as "curds and whey." It is not aged, but produced more quickly through fermentation.
LanguageData.FRMT_PrecursorCheese.label: Cheese Precursor
LanguageData.FRMT_PrecursorCheese.description: A preperation made from natural animal milk, lactose and acetic bacteria. Used to ferment into cheese.
